infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: Qutta uses your location to show nearby businesses and calculate distances for appointments.
infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: Qutta uses your camera to upload images for your business.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: Qutta accesses your photo library so you can upload photos for your business, staff, or services.
infoPlist.NSCalendarsUsageDescription: Qutta uses your calendar to help you manage and schedule appointments.

plugins.calendarPermission: Qutta uses your calendar to help set reminders for your appointments.

plugins.locationAlwaysAndWhenInUsePermission: Qutta uses your location to show nearby business and to calculate and show business distance from current location.

plugins.photosPermission: Qutta accesses your photos to let you share them with your clients.
